top.title: Ukraine condemns 'brutal' Russian strikes ahead of second day of peace talks
top.summary: One person died and 23 were injured as trilateral discussions in Abu Dhabi were set to resume.

top.title: Pentagon to offer 'more limited' support to US allies in defence strategy shift
top.summary: The US will also offer “more limited” support to US allies, according to a new national defence strategy document.

top.title: Harry says sacrifices by Nato troops in Afghanistan deserve 'respect'
top.summary: The US president's comments have been condemned by international allies, including UK veterans and politicians.

top.title: What does a new US TikTok deal mean for users?
top.summary: While TikTok's future in the US has been secured, questions remain about exactly what changes US users will see.

top.title: Is China quietly winning the AI race?
top.summary: The BBC's Lily Jamali looks into why big US firms and start-ups alike are turning to Chinese tech.

top.title: Ubisoft cancels six games including Prince of Persia and closes studios
top.summary: The studio, known for Assassin's Creed and Just Dance, is also delaying seven titles in a restructure.
